text: Jorge Marrale (born June 30, 1947) is a well-known Argentine actor. Marrale is known for his roles in Ashes of Paradise, The Lighthouse, Antigua, My Life, El Dia Que Me Ama, and in Ay Junacito. He was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
title: Jorge Marrale
